Dating: 30TH DYNASTY (not after); LATE PERIOD; 26TH DYNASTY (not before)
Name: Standing figure of Osiris
Description: The statuette of Osiris shows the god standing against a back pillar and set upon a high pedestal. The god is depicted as a mummy wearing the Atef-crown, a broad collar, and in his hands he holds the crook and the flail.
